sentences.sContent: Liaison between police forces and the art world is vital to combat art crime.
sentences.sCn: 警方和艺术界之间的联络对于打击艺术犯罪是至关重要的。

remMethod.val: lia(捆) + ison → 捆在一起 → 密切的联系

trans.tranCn: 密切的联系； 暧昧的关系
trans.tranOther: the regular exchange of information between groups of people, especially at work, so that each group knows what the other is doing
